decision_conditions: The modifications hereby approved to reduce the extent of the hardstanding and re-stain the permeable pavers in the front garden, shall be completed within six months from the date of this permission, otherwise the planning permission will lapse.

Reason: In the interests of the character and visual appearance of the property and surrounding area, in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7B of the Development Management Plan (2013), and policies D3 & D6 of The London Plan 2021. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the application documents: Existing Floor Plan & Elevation (556-EXT-01), Proposed Floor Plan & Elevation (556-PROP-02), Design and Access Statement
Reason: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
description: Provision of permeable hardstanding and soft landscaping to the front garden.
